d.name: Newspaper Seller
d.phase: On a random street corner in Dinotown, you see someone shouting and gesturing wildly, it's impossible not to notice him, in fact it's tiring just watching him, what on earth could this maniac want ? Maybe if you go a little closer, you might find out...
d.a: Flee! Far, far away from the nutcase !
d.phase: READ ALL ABOUT IT, THE DINOTOWN GAZETTE IS OUT NOW ! READ THE DINOTOWN LINEN AND YOU'LL KNOW ALL ABOUT DINOLAND AND THE DINOZ MASTERS WHO EXPLORE IT !
At least you've escaped, maybe he was going to swallow you in that gigantic north of his...

WRITTEN BY THE DINOZ MASTERS THEMSELVES, AND YES SIRREE BOB, YOU'RE READING IT STRAIGHT FROM THE HORSES MOUTH -KINDA ! ALL YOU NEED TO DO IS CLICK ON THE "GAZETTE" BUTTON ON THE MENU ON THE RIGHT THERE ! IT'S NOT ROCKET SCIENCE !
d.a: Any chance of you making just a little less noise ?
d.phase: OK THEN, I'LL LEAVE YOU TO IT, DON'T FORGET, THERE'S A NEW EDITION EVERY MONTH, EXCEPT WHEN THEY'RE ON STRIKE...
d.a: THANKS ! Let's take a look at this...
d.phase: Did you know that the DinoRPG gazette was available ? Well you do now, so you've got no excuse for not making the most of it, just head over to the Gazette page. See you there !
